item.title: bishop and knight
item.description: Coordinating minor pieces to checkmate the lone king can be tricky, especially under pressure. The super-GM Mamedov was able to find a way at the board but I’d rather prove to myself I can checkmate an engine first. walk the walk Take it away, maestro: talk the talk To sound wise ðŸ¦‰ the names of the common methods are: DelÃ©tang method - here’s an overview on wikipedia the W method - a faster technique, see the path of the knight below
